dcterms:description: A bi-modal dataset composed of images and audio, where the first modality consists of 28 Ã— 28 grey scale images from the MNIST dataset and the second modality features pronounced digits from the Free Spoken Digits dataset, perturbed by adding random noises sampled from the ESC-50 dataset.
dcterms:title: AV-MNIST

dcterms:creator: Z. Jackson
dcterms:description: A dataset containing spoken digits, used as the second modality in the AV-MNIST dataset.
dcterms:title: Free Spoken Digits Dataset

dcterms:creator: K. J. Piczak
dcterms:description: A dataset for environmental sound classification, used to add random noise to the audio samples in the AV-MNIST dataset.
dcterms:title: ESC-50

dcterms:creator: Y. LeCun
B. E. Boser
J. S. Denker
D. Henderson
R. E. Howard
W. E. Hubbard
L. D. Jackel
dcterms:description: A dataset of handwritten digits, used as the first modality in the AV-MNIST dataset.
dcterms:title: MNIST
